mapper.select: SELECT mes.MESSAGE_NUM, mem.MEM_KIND, mes.RECEIVER, mes.MESSAGE_TITLE, mes.SEND_DATE FROM MEMBER mem, MESSAGE mes WHERE mes.RECEIVER = mem.MEM_ID AND mes.SENDER = #{ADMIN_ID}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MESSAGE_NUM DESC) RNUM, M.MEM_KIND, S.MESSAGE_NUM, S.MESSAGE_TITLE, S.MESSAGE_CONTENT, S.SEND_DATE FROM MEMBER M, MESSAGE S WHERE M.MEM_ID = RECEIVER AND MESSAGE_NUM = #{MASSAGE_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NUM, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, SENDER, RECEIVER, MESSAGE_DATE ) VALUES (MESSAGE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MESSAGE_TITLE}, #{MESSAGE_CONTENT}, #{SENDER}, #{RECEIVER}, SYSDATE )
